page.title: 17MIN OF AG. FISHERIES & FOOD
page.content: THE MINISTRY OF AGRICULTURE, FISHERIES AND FOOD, SITUATEDIN SITTINGBOURNE ROAD, MAIDSTONE, IS THE GOVERNING BODY FOR FARMING AND GENERAL AGRICULTURE IN KENT AND PARTS OF SURREY. IT DEALS WITH THE BEE KEEPING AND FISHERIES OF THIS AREA, MAINTAINING STOCKS AND ENSURING THE QUALITY OF THEIR PRODUCTS. THESE ARE GIVEN GRANTS WHERE NECESSARY. AGRICULTURAL GRANTS ARE ALSO ADMINSTERED AND A CHECK MAINTAINED ON CROPS AND LAND USE AS WELL AS CONSERVATION OF WOODLAND AND HEDGEROWS, TO A CERTAIN EXTENT. THE MINISTRY OF AGRICULTURE FISHERIES AND FOOD IS A REGIONAL SECTION OF THE BRITISH GOVERNMENTS FARMING BODY.
